* Dinobot had no time to react before Tavatron let loose her optic lasers, 
he snarled in surprise as she fired.
He roared as he felt the lasers strike his face, he then threw Tavatron to 
the ground as hard as he possibly could!
Dinobot covered his optics with his hands and snarled deeply, he then 
removed his hands and looked around. His right optic was damaged to the 
extent that it no longer worked but his left optic still functioned fully!
Dinobot could not blame Tavatron for shooting him  directly in the face but 
then she couldn't blame him for taking this practice to a whole new level! 
Survival!
It had been YEARS since Dinobot had ever felt the pure rush of adrenaline 
course through his veins but that is what he felt now!
In fighting terms it was also known as 'Battle Rage!!!'
Dinobot looked around with his one good optic and finally spotted Tavatron, 
his target!!    He breathed in deeply and quickly then let out a roar so 
blood chillingly fierce that it could have made a rock run in fear!*


" RUN!!!"
